snippet: Gov. Rick Perry said he would assess whether there was a path for him to continue after a fifth-place finish in Iowa.
abstract: Gov. Rick Perry said he would assess whether there was a path for him to continue after a fifth-place finish in Iowa.
lead_paragraph: DES MOINES -- Rick Perry said Tuesday night that he would return to Texas to "assess" whether there was a path for him to continue in the presidential campaign.

headline.main: Perry to Return to Texas to Assess Campaign
